PropertySetDef.Name: Pset_ReinforcementBarCountOfIndependentFooting
PropertySetDef.Definition: Reinforcement Concrete parameter [ST-2]: The amount number information of reinforcement bar with the independent footing. The X and Y direction are based on the local coordinate system of building storey. The X and Y direction of the reinforcement bar are parallel to the X and Y axis of the IfcBuildingStorey's local coordinate system, respectively.

PropertyDef.Name: Reference
PropertyDef.Definition: A descriptive label for the general reinforcement type.

PropertyDef.Name: XDirectionLowerBarCount
PropertyDef.Definition: The number of bars with X direction lower bar.

PropertyDef.Name: XDirectionUpperBarCount
PropertyDef.Definition: The number of bars with X direction upper bar.

PropertyDef.Name: YDirectionLowerBarCount
PropertyDef.Definition: The number of bars with Y direction lower bar.

PropertyDef.Name: YDirectionUpperBarCount
PropertyDef.Definition: The number of bars with Y direction upper bar.
